name: Renaissance 2.0: The Digital Evolution of Art

metadata.name: Metaverse Gateway
metadata.description:
The giant screen serves as a gateway to the Metaverse, representing the potential for museums and galleries to offer new realms of art and culture to their audiences, beyond the traditional physical limitations.

Collecting this 1/1 NFT includes a 1/1 physical print of the artwork, signed by the artist. The unframed print measures 90 x 60 cm and includes shipping anywhere in the world.
